aiHints.identificationPrompt: Identify these sneakers. Extract: brand, model, colorway, size, SKU, release year.
aiHints.gradingRules: Assess: sole condition, upper condition, box condition, authenticity markers. Grade: Deadstock/VNDS/Used.
aiHints.valuationRules: Consider: rarity, hype, size availability, condition, box, market trends, StockX/GOAT data.
